title: Bug: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version, there is a bug where the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor.
OB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, no popup menu appears.
EB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, a popup menu with options to add breakpoints/marks should appear.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected result: A popup menu should appear with options to add breakpoints/marks.
Actual result: No popup menu appears.
